identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a mock interview platform that feels like a high-stakes professional environment, not a generic SaaS tool.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Swiss Precision' with 'Code Editor' aesthetics.
Emotion First: The design must evoke 'Focus' and 'Professional Growth'.
Content is King: The interview questions and feedback are the heroes.
Zoom In: Focus on the timer and the question.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to reduce cognitive load during the interview.
anti_patterns: No center-aligned text for long descriptions.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and modal headers.

code.usage: Code snippets, technical terms, and the code editor interface.

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (Trust/Clarity) with Dark Mode Toggle (Developer Preference).

primary.name: Deep Royal Blue
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key branding elements.

colors.gradients: Minimal usage. Only for 'Active State' borders or subtle glows. NO full-screen gradients.

landing_page.hero: Split layout: Left text (H1 + CTA), Right image (Confident Candidate).
landing_page.features: Grid layout (3-col) with 'Glass' cards for features.

interview_interface.right_panel: Answer Input (Text Area or Code Editor).

inputs.style: Minimalist. border-b-2 (focus:border-primary) or standard outline with ring-offset.

visual_enhancers.texture: Subtle noise overlay on backgrounds to reduce 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md for sticky headers and modal overlays.
visual_enhancers.motion: Framer Motion for page transitions and staggered list entrances.

hero_candidate.description: Confident Asian woman in suit, smiling during interview.

office_bg.usage: Background for login/signup or subtle overlay.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is WCAG AA compliant. Use slate-700+ for text on white.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Implement the 'Split Screen' layout for the interview page strictly.
Use the 'Deep Royal Blue' as the primary brand color.
Ensure the 'Timer' is prominent and uses the 'Amber' warning color when time is low.
Do NOT use generic AI robot icons. Use abstract geometric shapes or professional icons.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
